item.title: Blog hello, world!
item.description:
After all, my blog has been released!
There are a lot of tools for doing personal blog. You can choose any one or even build it by yourself. I decided move forward with static site solution, like many ather developers. Reading this article you can get more about building personal blog, static-site, theme, Hugo, NexT.

item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome to my website!

Thank you for visiting my blog and I hope you enjoy reading about my experiences and insights in the world of software engineering .
